Package game

Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
game.GameClient
public class GameClient extends Object
This is the GameClient class that creates a client thread, can connect and communicate with the GameServer.
Author:
Skylar Phanenhour, Ahnaf Kamal

    Constructors

    Description
    GameClient(String hostName, int port, String userName, JTextArea log, GameModel model, GameController controller)
    Overloaded constructor to create the client

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    closeReaders()
    closeReaders method that is used to close the reader and print stream that the client is using.
    protected void
    disconnectClient()
    disconnecClient method that disconnects the client

    isConnected()
    Getter for isConnected variable
    protected void
    messageFromServer()
    Method that is used to receive messages that have been sent from the server.
    protected void
    sendData()
    sendData method that sends the username, best time, best score to the server, where it gets stored in a leaderboard.
    protected void
    sendGame()
    sendGame method that sends the board configuration that the client is using in play or design.

    This message is used to get the text chat and send it to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameClient

      public GameClient(String hostName, int port, String userName, JTextArea log, GameModel model, GameController controller)
      Overloaded constructor to create the client
      Parameters:
      hostName - - Server IP that the client connects to
      port - - Port number that the client connects to
      userName - - Client's username that is entered, stored in the model
      log - - Text area to display messages
      model - - GameModel to store/access variables within
      controller - - Gives access to controller

  • Method Details

    • messageFromServer

      protected void messageFromServer()
      Method that is used to receive messages that have been sent from the server.

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage(String message)
      This message is used to get the text chat and send it to the server. Acts like commands basically.
      Parameters:
      message - - Message from the text chat

    • disconnectClient

      protected void disconnectClient()
      disconnecClient method that disconnects the client

    • sendGame

      protected void sendGame()
      sendGame method that sends the board configuration that the client is using in play or design.

    • sendData

      protected void sendData()
      sendData method that sends the username, best time, best score to the server, where it gets stored in a leaderboard.

    • closeReaders

      protected void closeReaders()
      closeReaders method that is used to close the reader and print stream that the client is using.
